desc.pigdadmod.rune_slab: Right-click with a pickaxe to change the rune's state
desc.pigdadmod.athame: Biggest fear of the undead! Become a zombie slayer
desc.pigdadmod.eternal_snowball: An ever-lasting snowball that deals damage. It is quite cold tho
desc.pigdadmod.chalice: A never ending milk bucket. What would you use this for?
desc.pigdadmod.wand: The dream of any Gardener! Grow your crops infinitely.
